lines.text: I knew from when I was real small people were gonna know who I was, I always had that feeling... I just never knew how they were gonna learn. I kind of enjoy it now because even after I die, people are gonna remember me forever. People are gonna talk about me for years. People in West Memphis will tell their kids stories... It'll be sorta like I'm the West Memphis boogie man. Little kids will be looking under their beds - "Damien might be under there!"
Based on what you've heard up there, do you think Damien might have killed those three boys?

[after a long pause]
They make it seem like he did.
Would you have a hard time letting him go if you were on the jury?
